Edited April 11, 2014 by Javster

Okay, you asked for it! Starting with free (usually open source) games (I prefer multi platform/ cross platform or web based): ancient warfare in 0 A.D., the Armagetron Tron clone, turn based tactical in Battle for Wesnoth, real time strategy Bos Wars, online tanks in BZ Flag, Freeciv strategy, RTS MegaGlest, Neverball, FPS Nexuiz, space sim Oolite, OpenArena, OpenTransportTycoon, MMORPG Ryzom, Scorched3D, the Sintel alpha (may need BlenderPlayer, which comes with Blender), TORCS racing, FPS Tremulous(been a while), TripleA board strategy, Unknown Horizons RTS, 3D space sim Vega Strike, Widelands RTS; Yo, Frankie!, Cube 2 FPS, PlaneShift role-play, Smokin' Guns, VDrift racer, Warsow run 'n gun, World of Padman little players, Exult, Racer and Bungie's Marathon trilogy. There's one called Alien Arena, which I've not yet played. With the proper old discs, there's Bungie's Myth II and with CrossOver, Unreal Gold.

For game purchases, I play the Half Life and Portal series, Machinarium, and the fairly gruesome (but no fighting?)Penumbra series. I miss some old games such as Myst, System Shock and Crimson Skies.
